bREAKING Resident students will have the opportunity to receive the first dose of the Moderna vaccine at the Stony Brook Union on Tuesday April  from  a.m PERIOD to  p.m PERIOD

For this years Sex and Relationships Special Issue The Statesman chose the theme body positivity. seven participants chose to step in front of our cameras and tell us their stories PERIOD Photography by Sara Ruberg Rabia Gursoy and Gabby Pardo PERIOD

Nearly  ballots were cast in the elections this year  a  increase in student body votes from last year PERIOD Spencer beat the opposing partys candidate senior political science and economics major Justin Ullman by  votes and another candidate senior psychology major Vincent Ferrara by  votes PERIOD

Seven groups are uniting to form the State University of New York COVID19 ReImagine and Resume Residential Education Task Force whose goal is to create a plan to reopen SUNY campuses in the fall PERIOD

As the coronavirus COVID19 pandemic continues to rage through New York and the world Stony Brook University will let its students know its plans for the upcoming fall semester by June  PERIOD

It was like a slap in the face that they took our money for four years and cant even make an effort to tell us that they plan on rescheduling it she said PERIOD

Instead of watching the sunset at the hilltop of the Piazzale Michelangelo and tasting the fluffiness of homemade gnocchi I am now writing this on my fourth day of selfquarantine in my Staten Island home because of the COVID19 outbreak PERIOD

I had the opportunity to attend a student media briefing with Interim President Dr PERIOD Michael Bernstein on Wednesday Dec PERIOD  with Editor in Chief of The Statesman Gary Ghayrat and Assistant News Editor Maya Brown PERIOD The briefing consisted of other campus media outlets along with The Statesman and other members of Bernsteins team such as University Media Relations Officer Lauren Sheprow PERIOD

The Beautiful World of Jeffree Star the firstever documentary exposing the business and process of creating makeup premiered on the channel of longtime YouTuber Shane Dawson this past October PERIOD With the first episode premiering on Oct PERIOD  and the last episode on Nov PERIOD  each episode has over  million views PERIOD

On Nov PERIOD   The New York Times published two news articles about prejudice against Hispanics in the U.S PERIOD I was casually scrolling on Twitter and saw both articles tweeted minutes apart by The Times
